item.title: Hey i need some help with my client!
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

i need help with changing my umm… (srry im from norway and dont talk so good english) how to change the desktop/screensaver/background on my client.

and i know how to add customs but how to recolor them like in the 8 thing in client folder. it stays some numbers under the ID and thats the color like this —>

if(i == 13427){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anInt174 = 7401;//item look
class8.anInt181 = 1957;
class8.anInt190 = 498;
class8.anInt198 = 484;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -1;
class8.anInt194 = -1;
class8.anInt165 = 7401;
class8.anInt200 = 701;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = "Blood godsword ";
class8.aByteArray178 = “A great weapon, used by the best the dark warriors.”.getBytes();
}

just where i type the color on the item and can somone make me the list off color numbers? like 1 is color ***** and 2 is ****
or whatever number like 555 or 8392 can u make the list please.
i need green gs red gs and blue gs and stuff like that

ps. i made the blood gs and the ::pickup off it works fine

Read full topic
